alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 3:59AM EST until November 21 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of up to one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Pocahontas, Southeast Pocahontas and Southeast Randolph Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph
